medium: Silk, cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué, embroidery
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: Three panel huipil; white ground with bands of geometric forms in weft patterning, red, beige, yellow, pink; red fabric appliquéd at neck; embroidered floral and bird designs at neck.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
